EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Connecting Eclipse / Project Flux 7AM.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Spring Webinars: Connecting Eclipse to the Cloud-Based Era of Developer Tooling with Project Flux
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Connecting Eclipse to the Cloud-Based Era of Developer Tooling with Project Flux and speaker Martin Lippert. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, April 22, 2014 Europe: 3:00pm BST (London, UTC+1) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=660381904> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/cmp0401l/webcomponents/widget/globalcallin/globalcallin.do?siteurl=gopivotal&serviceType=EC&eventID=111195292&tollFree=1> Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 660 381 904 Thank you,
